LoyaltyPgmPtnrPrepaidPack.name: LoyaltyPgmPtnrPrepaidPack
LoyaltyPgmPtnrPrepaidPack.description: Represents information about a prepaid set of points purchased by a loyalty program partner.

EndDate.description: The date until when the loyalty program partner prepaid pack is effective.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

LoyaltyProgramPartnerId.description: The loyalty program partner associated with the loyalty program partner prepaid pack.

Name.description: The name of the prepaid points pack.

OrderId.description: The order associated with the loyalty program partner prepaid pack.

PurchaseDate.description: Required. The date when the prepaid pack was purchased by the loyalty program partner.

PurchasedPoints.description: Required. The number of points credited to the associated loyalty program partner when a prepaid pack of points is purchased.

RemainingPoints.description: The number of points remaining in the loyalty program partner's prepaid pack.
